casebody.data:
Steven MOZER, Appellant-Movant,
v.
NEW JERSEY DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent-Respondent. M-442/443/444/445/446 September Term 2017
080163 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 16, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for leave to proceed as an indigent (M-442) is granted; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for acceleration (M-445) is dismissed as moot; and it is further

ORDERED that the motion for miscellaneous relief (M-446), motion for a stay (M-444), and motion for leave to appeal (M-443) are denied.
